item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. What’s really behind Trump’s abrupt pivot to Russia?
2. US stocks post worst slide in two months on gloomy economic data
3. Apple withdraws cloud encryption service from UK after government order
4. Ukraine to sign critical minerals deal ‘in the very short term’, US claims
5. Trump fires top US military officer in Pentagon shake-up
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
